SELECT wid, login_id AS loginId, a.NAME AS `name`, SEX AS sex, b.NAME AS sexName, date_format(a.BIRTH_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS birthDate, a.PHONE AS phone, EDUCATION AS education, COMPANY AS company, date_format(WORKING_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS workingTime, COST AS cost, TYPE AS type, c. NAME AS typeName, BUSINESS AS business, GROUP_CONCAT(e.`NAME`) AS businessName, NUMBER AS `number`, REGION AS region, d. NAME AS regionName, ADDRESS AS address, case when a.type='1' then 1 when a.type in('2','3','4') then 2 else 3 end as roleId FROM tb_user_info a LEFT JOIN tb_dic_user_sex b ON a.sex = b.id LEFT JOIN tb_dic_user_type c ON a.TYPE = c.id LEFT JOIN tb_dic_xj_xzqh d ON IF ( LOCATE(',', a.REGION) != 0, RIGHT ( a.REGION, LENGTH(REGION) - LOCATE(',', a.REGION) ), a.REGION ) = d.id LEFT JOIN tb_dic_business e ON FIND_IN_SET(e.id, a.BUSINESS) > 0 where a.LOGIN_ID=#{loginId} GROUP BY a.wid

SELECT d.`NAME` AS `name`, d.ACTION AS action FROM tb_user_info a LEFT JOIN tb_sys_user_r_role b ON a.LOGIN_ID = b.LOGIN_ID LEFT JOIN tb_sys_role_r_menu c ON b.ROLE_ID = c.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN tb_sys_menu d ON c.MENU_ID = d.MENU_TYPE where 1=1
and a.login_id=#{loginId}
select login_id from tb_token where token=#{token}
